title: Given phosphoric Ka values make buffer with pH = 9

content.question: Acid Acid Dissociation Constant, Ka H3PO4 7 x 10–3 H2PO4– 8 x 10–8 HPO42– 5 x 10–13 On the basis of the information above, a buffer with a pH = 9 can best be made by using
